La Regina di Golconda
Town Hall, Downham Market, Norfolk Hymn tune contest (open to all sections)- 1st Cambridge Town, 2nd Soham Comrades, 3rd Heacham Silver. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 18, 2013, 9:30 p.m. Aug. 18, 2020, 3 p.m.
1 City of Cambridge Brass Band Robert Austin
2 Soham Comrades Band Fred Talbot
3 Norfolk Brass Ensemble Walter Nuttall
4 Dereham Band Unknown
